common.topdes: Node management is mainly used for the installation of sidecars on each node and managing various types of collectors through the sidecars.
common.name: Name

node.desc: Node management is mainly used for the installation of sidecars on each node and managing various types of collectors through the sidecars.
node.btntext1: If you do not have the configuration file you need, please click
node.bindaditinfo: After binding the configuration file, the corresponding collector will start automatically.
node.restartCollectorInfo: Are you sure to restart these collectors?
node.uninstallCollectorInfo: Are you sure to uninstall these collectors?
node.installWayDes: Remote installation requires providing host-related login information to perform remote installation of collectors, including sidecar and nas excutor; for manual installation, follow the installation steps to manually operate and install the collector on the host.
node.defaultNodeDes: Remote installation of collectors requires using the default node to push relevant installation packages. A node with normal nas excutor status must be selected.
node.defaultUninstallNodeDes: Uninstalling the controller requires using the default node and selecting a node with normal NAS excotor status.
node.uninstallSidecarInfo: Are you sure you want to uninstall these controllers?
node.sidecarVersionDes: Please select the Controller version for remote installation.
node.executorVersionDes: Please select the Nas Executor version for remote installation.
node.installingTips: There are still nodes being installed, and after returning, you can check the list of nodes that are installed normally.
node.downloadTips: 1. Select the appropriate version to download the controller installation package and configuration file template
node.scriptTips: 2. Execute the following script to install the controller
node.finishTips: 3. After manual installation, the normal nodes of the controller can be viewed in the node list
node.uninstallSidecarTips: Are you sure to uninstall these sidecars ?
node.restartSidecarTips: Are you sure to restart these sidecars ?
node.telegrafConfigTips: When opening the Telegraf probe, it automatically initializes and binds the corresponding configuration file. If you need to modify it later, please go to the 'Configuration List' to make changes.

Configuration.modifydelinfo: Are you sure to delete this Configurations?
Configuration.deleteinfo: Are you sure to delete this Configuration?

variable.deleteinfo: Are you sure to delete this variable?

collector.title: Overview
collector.desc: Introduce each collector, including basic information, usage scenarios, and collected data.
